feed.title: Bow Valley (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bow Valley (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bow Valley 8:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 36 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
